title: The Prize
brief_description: Snowy, a six-year-old boy wins a goat at a country show, and takes it home to show his friend, Lisa. However, the goat is lost andn suspicion falls on two boys, Dan and Marcus. There is a chase down-river in sawn-off barrels, a fight in the water and a lucky escape when the river reaches a waterfall.
